cgcloud__Trip_List__c.name: cgcloud__Trip_List__c
cgcloud__Trip_List__c.description: Use Trip List to plan visits based on a predefined sequence of customers.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Responsible__c.description: Reference to the user who's responsible for the trip list.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org of the trip list.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the trip list is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the trip list is valid.
